mapper.select: /* Common.xml -> selectGridColInfoAll */ SELECT COMP_CD COMPCD ,USER_ID USERID ,WINDOW_NAME WINDOWNAME ,GRID_ID GRIDID ,COL_KEY COLKEY ,COL_NAME COLNAME ,COL_HIDDEN COLHIDDEN ,COL_WIDTH COLWIDTH ,COL_INX COLINX FROM BC_GRIDINFO WHERE COMP_CD = #{COMP_CD} AND USER_ID = #{USER_ID} ORDER BY USER_ID ,WINDOW_NAME ,GRID_ID ,COL_INX

/* Common.xml -> selectCommonCode */ SELECT TAIL.READ_CD CODE , GetCodeNm(HEAD.HEAD_ID, TAIL.CODE, #{LANG}) VALUE FROM BC_COMM_H HEAD JOIN BC_COMM_L TAIL ON HEAD.HEAD_CD = TAIL.HEAD_CD AND TAIL.STATUS = 'Y' WHERE HEAD.HEAD_ID = #{HEAD_CD} AND HEAD.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY TAIL.PRIORITY
